Labels.Value: = "Claus BÃ¶hmer"       de.kdac.jsd.authors = "eso@bistum-eichstaett.de"       de.kdac.jsd.url = "https://hub.docker.com/r/kidac/jsd"       de.kdac.jsd.documentation = "https://hub.docker.com/r/kidac/jsd"       de.kdac.jsd.source = "https://github.com/kidac/jsd"       de.kdac.jsd.version = "4.5.0"       de.kdac.jsd.vendor = "KDAC - https://ews.kdac.de"       de.kdac.jsd.licenses = "https://www.atlassian.com/legal/software-license-agreement, https://www.atlassian.com/legal/privacy-policy"       de.kdac.jsd.title = "Atlassian Jira Service Desk (KDAC Version)"       de.kdac.jsd.description = "Adapted Atlassians Jira Service Desk Dockerfile used by https://ews.kdac.de"

CmdLine: apk --no-cache upgrade  && apk add --no-cache bash curl ghostscript motif ttf-dejavu tini  && fc-cache -f
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: mkdir -p ${JIRA_INSTALL_DIR}  && curl -jkSL ${DOWNLOAD_URL} | tar -xz --strip-components=1 -C "$JIRA_INSTALL_DIR"  && chown -R ${RUN_USER}:${RUN_GROUP} ${JIRA_INSTALL_DIR}/  && sed -i -e 's/port="8080"/port="8080" secure="${catalinaConnectorSecure}" scheme="${catalinaConnectorScheme}" proxyName="${catalinaConnectorProxyName}" proxyPort="${catalinaConnectorProxyPort}"/' ${JIRA_INSTALL_DIR}/conf/server.xml  && sed -i -e 's/Context path=""/Context path="${catalinaContextPath}"/' ${JIRA_INSTALL_DIR}/conf/server.xml  && ln -s /usr/lib/libfontconfig.so.1 /usr/lib/libfontconfig.so  && ln -s /lib/libuuid.so.1 /usr/lib/libuuid.so.1  && ln -s /lib/libc.musl-x86_64.so.1 /usr/lib/libc.musl-x86_64.so.1  && sed -i -e 's/^JVM_SUPPORT_RECOMMENDED_ARGS=""$/: \${JVM_SUPPORT_RECOMMENDED_ARGS:=""}/g' ${JIRA_INSTALL_DIR}/bin/setenv.sh  && sed -i -e 's/^JVM_\(.*\)_MEMORY="\(.*\)"$/: \${JVM_\1_MEMORY:=\2}/g' ${JIRA_INSTALL_DIR}/bin/setenv.sh  && sed -i -e 's/grep "java version"/grep -E "(openjdk|java) version"/g' ${JIRA_INSTALL_DIR}/bin/check-java.sh
Commands.Name: run
